intro: Dive into the fascinating world of music! At Melody Mind, you can prove your music knowledge in exciting quiz rounds. Answer questions about songs from different decades, artists, albums, and music history. Collect points, earn golden records, and challenge other music enthusiasts. From rock to pop, hip-hop to classical - test your knowledge in your favorite genres. Start your musical quiz adventure now!

overview.title: Overview
overview.text: Welcome to MelodyMind! Your goal is to answer questions about songs, artists, and albums from different music genres. Choose a genre and test your knowledge. The more questions you answer correctly, the more points you'll earn.

difficultyLevels.title: Difficulty Levels
difficultyLevels.intro: There are three difficulty levels you can choose from:

easy.title: Easy
easy.description: 10 questions per round. Perfect for refreshing your knowledge and having fun

medium.title: Medium
medium.description: 15 questions per round. A challenge for advanced music lovers

hard.title: Hard
hard.description: 20 questions per round. Only for true music experts!

titles.intro: Each difficulty level has its own title that you can unlock:

novice.title: Music Novice
novice.description: All questions answered correctly in easy mode

master.title: Music Master
master.description: All questions answered correctly in medium mode

legend.title: Music Legend
legend.description: All questions answered correctly in hard mode

goldenRecords.title: Golden Records
goldenRecords.intro: When you answer all questions in a category correctly, you'll receive a golden record:

rankings.title: Rankings
rankings.description: The ranking system compares you with other players. Your placement in the Top 10 is based on your collected points in all categories

types.genre: Genre-specific ranking: Best players of a genre
types.overall: Overall ranking: Best players across all categories

tips.startEasy: Start in easy mode to get a feel for the game
tips.chooseStrengths: Choose your strengths and play the genres you're confident in
tips.practice: Practice regularly to improve your score
tips.accuracy: Accuracy over speed – read each question carefully

serverLogs.text: The provider of the pages automatically collects and stores information in server log files that your browser automatically transmits to us.

rights.title: 3. Your Rights
rights.intro: You have the right at any time:

list.information: To receive information about your stored personal data
list.correction: To request correction or deletion of your personal data
list.restriction: To request restriction of data processing
list.portability: To receive your data in a structured format

contact.title: 4. Contact
contact.text: If you have any questions about privacy, you can contact us at any time:

progress.title: Game Progress and Highscores
progress.intro: For the functionality of the game, we store the following data:

list.awards: Earned awards (Gold, Silver, and Bronze LPs)

progress.purpose: This data is necessary to save your game progress and provide the highscore function.

localStorage.intro: We use your browser's local storage for:
localStorage.storage: This data is stored exclusively on your device and is not transmitted to our servers.

session.intro: For game functionality, we use session cookies that store the following information for the duration of your game session:

list.progress: Game progress in the current round

deletion.title: 6. Data Deletion
